name: Blackout (itch) (CoderAngel)
description:
This game jam entry is intended to be accessible and enjoyable to a wide range of different gamers - including those who are blind, color-blind, visually impaired, deaf, or hard of hearing.  As such, this game also offers players without accommodation needs the opportunity to experience a world without sight or a world without sound.

This games intends to remind people that there is real strength in supporting the REAL WORLD differences of people from all walks of life.

Known Issues:
1) If you exit a menu screen before the screen-reader finishes reading, the audio might overlap the next menu.
2) The toggle button checkmark doesn't always reflect changes, so I've colored the text instead - white means "off", colored means "on".
